title: baked tofu
ingredients: 2 Tbsp soy sauce or liquid aminos
instructions: Slice tofu into 2 or 3 slabs or cut into cubes. Optionally, press out any extra moisture with a dish towel.
Mix sauce from remaining ingredients then soak tofu.
Preheat oven to 400°F and let the tofu marinate while it’s heating.
When oven is hot, place on a large sheet pan lined with parchment or Silpat.
Cook for 25–30 minutes, flipping in the middle.
notes: - This is lighty seasoned and ready for use in other recipes. - I like to use this on rice bowls with vegetables and a peanut sauce.
